alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 4:28PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact northeast Antelope Valley in Los Angeles County through 530 PM PDT... At 424 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms in the northeast Antelope Valley near Saddleback Butte. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and heavy downpours that could cause localized flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saddleback Butte State Park and eastern portions of Lancaster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
